participant_1.background:
I enjoy the fresh taste of my home-grown vegetables.
i like crocheting.
my favorite band is imagine dragons.
I start my morning with a walk around the neighborhood to get some fresh air and see what's going on at the local shops.
i have survived near death experiences.

participant_2.background:
I celebrated my birthday with my friends and family, and listened to a lot of country music.
i am the youngest sibling of four.
I'm not exactly rich, but I like to use my money to travel and experience new things.
I started my own business.
I have never been arrested, and I am proud of my clean record.

content.text: It was good! I celebrated my birthday with my friends and family. How was yours?
I am glad to hear that! My day was great. I started my morning with a walk around my neighborhood, and then I crocheted for a few hours.
Crocheting sounds fun! I wish I knew how to do that. What kind of things do you like to crochet?
I like to crochet blankets and scarves. I also like to crochet hats for my friends and family.
That's so nice of you! I'm sure your friends and family appreciate your handmade gifts.
Thank you! They do. I love to crochet because it's a relaxing way to spend my time.
I can see how that would be relaxing. I love to listen to country music when I crochet.
That sounds like a great way to relax. What are some of your favorite country songs?
I love all kinds of country music, but some of my favorites are "Sweet Home Alabama" by Lynyrd Skynyrd, "Achy Breaky Heart" by Billy Ray Cyrus, and "Friends in Low Places" by Garth Brooks.
Those are all great songs! I love "Sweet Home Alabama".
It's a classic! I'm glad you like it.
